body: Why do people keep commenting shit about NTR??? If you hate it, why do you all keep on showing up on anythinf with NTR tags
Hey, that's hell you're scrolling into.
@LordCellofEarth9 he's an ntr cuckwhore faggot, he cannot understand things such as logic or reason, he's just garbage

@bladenight21, my complaint was at the taggers not tagging right, you'd hear less of us "vanillafags" minus those's like "Iexpectedbetter" if they'd stopped this retarded practice of not properly tagging NTR, causing the Blacklist to not shroud said NTR out. I will say I'm starting to see "NTRCUCKS" show up in Vanilla stories just to complain about them. Had some respect for you guys in that you didn't mudsling back other then to defend your "kink". But now that's gone now. So now I say with "Iexcepectedbetter" "KILLALLCUCKS". (Not that I'm going to follow their example and go in every NTR story just to repeat the same comment)
@waaaaaaa I don't exist to entertain you, so I don't care, if you don't want to read, don't read it, but did you really have to waste time making a comment how you won't read my comment.....really?
@bladenight21 Please just fucking die or change your mind fag
It should just be tagged appropriately, that's all there is to it. Anybody that posts should be able to do that one thing correctly atleast.
Aww cute. Look at the retarded vanillafags trying to defend their commenting on the NTR works that they supposedly "hate". Btw kill yourselves :)
too long didnt read. tfw cant comment shorter than 4 characters

I agree with you "Iexpectedbetter". I'm starting to hate these's taggers as they keep doing shit like this, especially with the "re-uploading" shit till they just call it "Multi-Series" and expect you to know what it is already (Trying to justify not having to tag it much, "curious" how they neglect to tag it Cheating & NTR when it is). What's the point of chastising the Cheating/NTR haters when they complain to blacklist, when the taggers seem to be doing everything they can to "trick" us into viewing it, especially those who like saw the english version first LONG before the original JAP so they had no idea it was Cheating/NTR till it was too late.

Me thinks everytime one clicks into a doujin, it gets treated as though it's "popular" because of "views", that's why they don't tag it right....the only other explanation is they like "VanillaFags" like us making negative comments just to start a comment war between NTR defenders and us on purpose. I just BLACKLIST the artist/group now.
